
{{alias}}( arr )
    Tests whether every element in an array-like object is truthy.

    Parameters
    ----------
    arr: ArrayLikeObject
        Input array-like object.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether every element is truthy.

    Examples
    --------
    > var arr = [ 1, 1, 2, 3 ];
    > var bool = {{alias}}( arr );
    true

    > var arr = [ 1, 1, 0, 1 ];
    > var bool = {{alias}}( arr );
    false

    See Also
    --------
    -   {{alias}} ({{alias:@stdlib/utils/any}})
    -   {{alias}} ({{alias:@stdlib/utils/none}})
    -   {{alias}} ({{alias:@stdlib/utils/some}})
